reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 45/17: COUNCIL COMPOSITION - REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF PEEL
reg_info.reg_name_text: COUNCIL COMPOSITION - REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF PEEL

content.content: 1. The Regional Municipality of Peel may exercise its power under section 218 of the Act to change the composition of its council by, (a) increasing the number of members from the City of Brampton from 7 to 11; and (b) increasing the number of members from the City of Mississauga from 12 to 16.
content.raw_html:
1. The Regional Municipality of Peel may exercise its power under section 218 of the Act to change the composition of its council by,

(a) increasing the number of members from the City of Brampton from 7 to 11; and

(b) increasing the number of members from the City of Mississauga from 12 to 16.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).   Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
